title: Letters are skinnier on the lower left side and grow fatter as you move to the upper
author: Gfrankstecker

comments.content:
Not certain this is a font.  
Something similar in Comicraft's [Big Top](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803061842/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/comicraft/big-top/).  
Don
Another one in the ballpark: House Industries [Funhouse](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803061842/http:/www.houseind.com/fonts/generalcollection/viewfonts)
